text: Macrocoma bezdeki is a species of leaf beetle endemic to Socotra. It was described by Stefano Zoia in 2012. It is named after Jan Bezděk, a collector of the specimens studied and also a specialist in the leaf beetle subfamily Galerucinae. ==References== bezdeki Category:Beetles of Asia Category:Beetles described in 2012 Category:Endemic fauna of Socotra
title: Macrocoma bezdeki
